Html:
hello,

with i can setting the columwidth: $wb->getActiveSheet()->getColumnDimensionByColumn(0)->setWidth(0.7);

we can i do this with rowheight?

ok, i have:
Column begin with 0: $wb->getActiveSheet()->getColumnDimensionByColumn(0)->setWidth(0.7);



and Row begin with 1: $wb->getActiveSheet()->getRowDimension(1)->setRowHeight(10);

it is Strange.
Columns beginning with 0 rather than 1 is a historic aberration. Strange, yes! Not something that can be changed without breaking backward compatibility.
